name: BAGALION
description:
THE BATTLE FOR THE HEAVENS

In the year 2493 AD, the shooting star "Abraham" has been leaving glowing crystals behind in the sky, and said crystals offer infinite energy. This would be the solution to humanity's energy crisis, but something else has been eyeing such power before us...

The Bagalion Empire is a ruthless alien civilization from the skies ruled by Mth'ry'h, the Mother from the Void. She plans to take as many of Abraham's crystals as possible to power a death weapon capable of destroying entire worlds! That's why the E.N.O.C. (Empyrean Navy of Champions) is tasked to go to war against these hellish forces, with you as one their finest pilots and exterminators.

Now take the Heavens back, and strike fear in the Bagalion armies!
